sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>clothes</radical> radical and the <kanji>clothes</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Surprising!
readingMnemonic: An <reading>ea</reading>gle (<ja>い</ja>) sees a pile of your <kanji>clothes</kanji> and lays an <reading>e</reading>gg (<ja>え</ja>) in them. The eagle’s egg needs a soft warm place to incubate, and your pile of clothes is the perfect place.
readingInfo: Look at the eagle and her egg sitting atop your clothes. Every time you get close the eagle starts to screech at you fiercely. Screee! Screee!
